summary: A robber in custody, becomes wanted for murder when his younger brother kills a deputy sheriff to help him escape.
cast: Fred MacMurray|Lin McCarthy|Dorothy Green|Alan Baxter|Myrna Fahey|James Coburn|Francis De Sales|Gina Gillespie|Ron Hayes|Paul E. Burns|Charles Alvin Bell|Paul Bradley|Bill Clark|Hal K. Dawson|George DeNormand|Stanley Farrar|James Gavin|Herman Hack|Robert 'Buzz' Henry|Harrison Lewis|Rankin Mansfield|John Milford|Gilman Rankin|K.L. Smith|Bert Spencer|Wally West
title: El rostro del fugitivo
